original_title: Police Media Coordination Centre introduces new contact numbers
original_body_lines: Sri Lanka Police have informed the public that the contact numbers of its Media Coordination Centre (MCC) have been changed and have introduced four new contact numbers.
The public can contact the MCC of the Police Media Division through the following contact numbers: 011-2887903, 011-2887906, 011 – 2887907, and 011 – 2887973.
In a statement, the Police Media Division explained that the relevant contact numbers were changed following its office was relocated to the 13th floor of Sethsiripaya Stage II, in Battaramulla.
Accordingly, the MCC, too, has been shifted to the office premises in Battaramulla with effect from Monday (3), it added.
